about_the_game:
Underground. Faster than fear. You have become one with your war machine. Flesh sears. Metal warps. Darkness enfolds you. The tunnel has swallowed you whole. It is alive with the instruments of death. Even the walls want to kill you. The speed hurts. Trigger finger blisters. But it's all you've got. Because the light at the end of the tunnel is a thermonuclear explosion.

- Enemy weapons scream death down the black corridors!
- Haunting light sourcing and scaling
- Lock, dodge, turn, fire!
- Tunnel sensors guard against surprise attacks!
- Nuclear tunnel explosions get real dangerous, real fast!
detailed_description:

name: Tunnel B1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Pentium 4n
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Athlon 64 or later
  • Storage: 256 MB available space

reviews:
“If you're looking for a new style of 3-D game, check this out.”
86 – P.S.X. (Playstation Experience)

“This is turning out to be one of the best games of the year, and once the game is completed, you can restart and play again for the highest score.”
80 – Absolute Playstation
short_description: You tear through rock and steel: YOUR ONLY HOPE. For between the enemy and victory lies a devastating weapon, and between you and the enemy lies TUNNEL B1.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support
